nodes.text: Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 79

Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 79 is the seventy-ninth issue of the Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 published by De Agostini. It came with body frame fittings of the buildable R2-D2 and contained the articles "Getting Technical", "Droids of Yavin 4" and "Understanding Robotics".
